notes: it was less about contradictions and more about reminding me to do it right or else the code will become chaos.

a lot of self reflection and realization about llms in theeiicurrent state... they are gamified to suck people in they are more noise. they areligned to maximize user engagement without any tought to the cost. the nature of the ui, it always replies. it is addictive even in this stripped back state.
column11: I'm taking back the reins and trying to make intentional distance. think through things on my own before going to it.
